CentraDoc 7.2.x - Summary of Changes since 7.2.4

Table Of Contents

  • Introduction
  • Version 7.2.5
  • Third-party libraries
  • References

Introduction

These are the changes to CentraDoc since the Version 7.2.4 release 2023-04-05.

Version 7.2.5

  • #2490 Emscripten support and build compatibility via cmake. CMake builds available in cdoc/build/cmake.
    Note: emscripten build requires larger run time stack, use link option: -sSTACK_SIZE=1MB
  • #2491 Fixed legacy bug in PDF XRef Stream updates: Chrome and Edge would not see updates in some cases.
  • #2492 PDF create API New Form XObject calls with more neutral parameter model:
void  Pdf_EndFormCTM(Pdf *self, const double bbox[4], const double mtx[6]);
void  Pdf_DrawFormCTM(Pdf *self, void *form, const double mtx[6]);
  • #2487 PDF Create API Added Pdf_DrawInlineImage for small images:
int Pdf_DrawInlineImage(
    Pdf *self,
    const char *data,
    int dataLength,
    int width,
    int height,
    int nComponents,
    int bitsPerComponent,
    const double_in points[6] /**< points: ll, lr, ul (ur is implied) */
);
  • #2488 Updated distributed FreeType version to 2.13.0.
  • #2468 Distiller updates
    • Fixed bug in font state maintenance from recent changes, causing page to not render
    • -polytext option for ps2pdf, renders text as paths
    • Improved font tracking for font capture, reduces redundant fonts in output
    • Fixed font capture issues with some Postscript Fonts
  • #2461 updated core Cython glue
  • #2444 RIP changes for PostScript page handling
  • #2432 more RIP examples & distribution includes more code examples
  • #2412 Generic Logger mechanism

Third-party libraries

  • AntiGrain - 2.4
  • FreeType - 2.13.0 UPDATED
  • JPEG - JPEG-9e
  • LCMS - 2.12
  • libdmtx - 0.7.7
  • libpng - 1.6.38
  • OpenJPEG - 2.5.0
  • QR-Code-generator-c - ~2018
  • sha2 - 1.0.1
  • YAJL - 2.0.1
  • ZLib - 1.2.13
